did.unittitle: American Philosophical Society Archives. Record Group IIf
did.abstract:
This is part of the large inventory for the American Philosophical Society Archives. For complete information concerning this collection, please view the
Collection Description.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Smithsonian Institution, Washington, 3 pp. and endorsement. L.S. Presentation and withdrawal of Father [George A.] Belcourt's memoir from the Smithsonian. Smithsonian building damaged by fire. $150,000-$200,000 repairs necessary. Possible combination of the Smithsonian library with libraries of Capitol and of Congress. The same to be opened to the public. FILM 235 FRAME27

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
